attributes.action: Make Mental Health First Aiders a requirement within all workplaces
attributes.additional_details: Based on the current pandemic it is estimated that Mental Health first aiders will be needed potentially higher than a physical first aided. It’s important the Mental Health of the nation is put as top priority and also employers understand the importance of Mental Health First Aiders in the workplace.
attributes.background:
The Health and Safety (First-Aid) Regulations 1981 require you to provide adequate and appropriate first-aid equipment, facilities and people so your employees can be given immediate help if they are injured or taken ill at work.

This should include physical and mental health first aid

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576887
